ARABIC: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِىٍّ يُمْنَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Was he not a drop of ejaculated sperm,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Was he not an emitted drop of semen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Was he not a drop of ejaculated semen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Does the human being think that he will be left uncontrolled?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Was he not just a drop of the semen that is discharged?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Was he not a Nutfah of semen emitted
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Was he not a small seed in the seminal elements,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Was he not a sperm-drop spilled?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Was he not a drop of fluid which gushed forth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Was he not once a drop of ejaculated semen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Was he not a sperm of emission emitted?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Was he not a drop of emitted semen,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Was he not a drop of sperm emitted (in lowly form)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Was he not a Nutfah (mixed male and female discharge of semen) poured forth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, was he not an ejaculated drop (of sperm)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Was he not a drop of ejaculated semen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:37] Was he not — that is, [indeed] he was — a drop of emitted semen? (read yumnā or tumnā) deposited into the womb.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Was he not) i.e. Abu Jahl (a drop of fluid) man's sperm drops (which gushed forth) in the woman's womb; and it is also said: created in the woman's womb?
